meaningMnemonic: <radical>Twenty</radical> <radical>penguin</radical>s together are always <kanji>evil</kanji>. Penguins are seen in groups a lot, sure, but did you know that any time there are exactly twenty penguins in a group they're plotting evil things? Evil things like global warming. And how to eat all the fish in the world so humans can't have any.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>evil</kanji> penguins can't let you tell the other human's what you've seen, so they murder you and hide your body in a <reading>hay</reading>stack (へい). Your family will never know what happened to you. The penguins will get away with their evil plans.
